/usr/bin/c++   -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -DBOOST_SYSTEM_NO_DEPRECATED -lrt -lm -lpthread -g   CMakeFiles/CPP-Bigrams.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CPP-Bigrams.dir/ProducerConsumer/Producer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CPP-Bigrams.dir/ProducerConsumer/Consumer.cpp.o  -o CPP-Bigrams /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_iostreams.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_timer.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so -lpthread
